parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.80</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Arguments in MP</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Effects in MP</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set [[velocity]] (speed vector) of a vehicle.   Units are in metres per second. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[setVelocity]] [x, y, z] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [x, y, z]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck1 [[setVelocity]] [20, 0, 0];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Advanced method used for relative acceleration:
<code>_vel = [[velocity]] _vehicle;
_dir = [[direction]] _vehicle;
_speed = 10; [[comment]] "Added speed";
_vehicle [[setVelocity]] [
	(_vel [[select]] 0) + ([[sin]] _dir * _speed), 
	(_vel [[select]] 1) + ([[cos]] _dir * _speed), 
	(_vel [[select]] 2)
];
</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[velocity]], [[velocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityTransformation]], [[speed]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 20 Jun, 2014 - 16:50
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]
<dd class="note">(ArmA3 1.22) [[setVelocity]] will be affected by [[setDir]] and [[setVectorDirAndUp]], so use it after them.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
